## Description

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

## Motivation

Why do you need this feature? What use case would it solve?

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you would like to happen.

## Alternative Solutions

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, such as:
- Related issues or pull requests
- - Mockups or screenshots if applicable
  - - Affected service(s) (gateway, signal, risk, execution, dashboard)
   
    - ## Implementation Considerations
   
    - - What changes would need to be made?
      - - Are there any performance implications?
        - - Any breaking changes?
         
          - ## Definition of Done
         
          - - [ ] Feature is implemented according to spec
            - [ ] - [ ] Unit tests are added with adequate coverage
